ygData.subject: Re: newbie bards
ygData.msgSnippet: ... D oh!  I forgot about that.  I played around with the /follow command right after it went in, and discovered it resets you to walking.  Then promptly
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 18 Jun 1999, Dan Harmon wrote:
>
> I don't know if this applies to you, but when you /follow someone, take a
> look at the RUN/WALK toggle. It goes back & forth. If you happened to be
> walking when you /followed someone into a zone, you will be walking when you
> get to the other side.

D'oh! I forgot about that. I played around with the /follow
command right after it went in, and discovered it resets you
to walking. Then promptly forgot about it. Thanks! :-) (It
explains why I was walking after I zoned - because I had to
use the /follow command again).

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
